title: Measure of man
creator_credit: John Halas, Tony Guy and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: A brief animated history of measurement which shows that measuring is arbitrary and that counting is not. The most important advantage of the metric system of measurement is the interrelationship of the units. Common metric units are whosn within their range of application.
